SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,A.COMP_ID ,A.AREA ,A.MAKER ,A.MODEL_NM ,A.ROUT_DIV ,A.VHC_TYPE ,A.VHC_FUEL ,A.REMARK ,IF(C.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', NULL) RSV_STATE
,B.MNG_ID ,C.RSV_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(D.RSV_DT, '%Y%m%d') RSV_DT ,E.COMP_NM
FROM BMS_VHC_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_INFO B ON A.VHC_ID = B.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DESTI_RSV_RST_INFO C ON B.MNG_ID = C.MNG_ID AND COMPLETE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN BMS_DESTI_RSV_INFO D ON C.RSV_ID = D.RSV_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST E ON A.COMP_ID = E.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO F ON B.DVC_KIND = F.DL_CD AND F.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' WHERE F.TXT_VAL1 = 'RD'
AND A.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
GROUP BY A.VHC_ID ORDER BY A.VHC_ID

SELECT VHC.VHC_ID ,VHC.VHC_NO ,DVC.MNG_ID ,RST.PROCE_RST ,DATE_FORMAT(RST.SEND_DTM, '%Y%m%d') SEND_DTM ,ORG.ORG_NM ,DVC.DVC_KIND ,DVC.INST_LOC ,DATE_FORMAT(RSV.RSV_DT, '%Y%m%d') RSV_DT ,IF(RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', '예약종료') RSV_STATE FROM BMS_VHC_MST VHC LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ORG_MST ORG ON DVC.ORG_ID = ORG.ORG_ID AND ORG.ORG_DIV = 'OGD08' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL ON DVC.DVC_KIND = DL.DL_CD AND DL.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT JOIN BMS_DESTI_RSV_RST_INFO RST ON DVC.MNG_ID = RST.MNG_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DESTI_RSV_INFO RSV ON RST.RSV_ID = RSV.RSV_ID WHERE VHC.VHC_ID = #{VHC_ID} AND DL.TXT_VAL1 = 'RD'
AND RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N'
AND RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'Y'
AND DATE_FORMAT(RSV.RSV_DT, '%Y%m') = ${RSV_DT}
ORDER BY RSV.RSV_DT
